items.prompt: Which document is used to provide official information to the media?
items.explanation: A press release is the formal tool for media announcements.

items.prompt: Choose the correct reporting passive: 'It ____ that the company will announce a profit this year.'

items.prompt: Complete the personal passive: 'The new system ____ to be much more efficient.'
items.explanation: The structure is 'Subject + is + past participle + to + infinitive'.
